verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. saying

בְּיוֹם־ <S%H3117><s%> be-yom- day הַחֹ֥דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> ha-Cho-desh month הָרִאשׁ֖וֹן <S%H7223><s%> ha-ri-Shon On the first בְּאֶחָ֣ד <S%H259><s%> be-'e-Chad of the first לַחֹ֑דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> la-Cho-desh; month תָּקִ֕ים <S%H6965><s%> ta-Kim shalt thou set up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מִשְׁכַּ֖ן <S%H4908><s%> mish-Kan the tabernacle אֹ֥הֶל <S%H168><s%> 'O-hel of the tent מוֹעֵֽד׃ <S%H4150><s%> mo-'Ed. of the congregation

וְשַׂמְתָּ֣ <S%H7760><s%> ve-sam-Ta And thou shalt put שָׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> Sham, therein אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> 'et אֲר֣וֹן <S%H727><s%> a-Ron the ark הָעֵד֑וּת <S%H5715><s%> ha-'e-Dut; of the testimony וְסַכֹּתָ֥ <S%H5526><s%> ve-sak-ko-Ta and cover עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and הָאָרֹ֖ן <S%H727><s%> ha-'a-Ron the ark אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> 'et- with הַפָּרֹֽכֶת׃ <S%H6532><s%> hap-pa-Ro-chet. with the vail

וְהֵבֵאתָ֙ <S%H935><s%> ve-he-ve-Ta And thou shalt bring אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַשֻּׁלְחָ֔ן <S%H7979><s%> hash-shul-Chan, in the table וְעָרַכְתָּ֖ <S%H6186><s%> ve-'a-rach-Ta and set in order אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עֶרְכּ֑וֹ <S%H6187><s%> er-Ko; the things that are to be set in order וְהֵבֵאתָ֙ <S%H935><s%> ve-he-ve-Ta upon it and thou shalt bring אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַמְּנֹרָ֔ה <S%H4501><s%> ham-me-no-Rah, in the candlestick וְהַעֲלֵיתָ֖ <S%H5927><s%> ve-ha-'a-lei-Ta and light אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- נֵרֹתֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H5216><s%> ne-ro-Tei-ha. the lamps

וְנָתַתָּ֞ה <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-tat-Tah And thou shalt set אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מִזְבַּ֤ח <S%H4196><s%> miz-Bach the altar הַזָּהָב֙ <S%H2091><s%> haz-za-Hav of gold לִקְטֹ֔רֶת <S%H7004><s%> lik-To-ret, for the incense לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before אֲר֣וֹן <S%H727><s%> a-Ron the ark הָעֵדֻ֑ת <S%H5715><s%> ha-'e-Dut; of the testimony וְשַׂמְתָּ֛ <S%H7760><s%> ve-sam-Ta and put אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מָסַ֥ךְ <S%H4539><s%> ma-Sach the hanging הַפֶּ֖תַח <S%H6607><s%> hap-Pe-tach of the door לַמִּשְׁכָּֽן׃ <S%H4908><s%> lam-mish-Kan. to the tabernacle

וְנָ֣תַתָּ֔ה <S%H5414><s%> ve-Na-tat-Tah, And thou shalt set אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> 'et מִזְבַּ֣ח <S%H4196><s%> miz-Bach the altar הָעֹלָ֑ה <S%H5930><s%> ha-'o-Lah; of the burnt offering לִפְנֵ֕י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before פֶּ֖תַח <S%H6607><s%> Pe-tach the door מִשְׁכַּ֥ן <S%H4908><s%> mish-Kan of the tabernacle אֹֽהֶל־ <S%H168><s%> 'o-hel- of the tent מוֹעֵֽד׃ <S%H4150><s%> mo-'Ed. of the congregation

וְנָֽתַתָּ֙ <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-ta-Ta And thou shalt set אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַכִּיֹּ֔ר <S%H3595><s%> hak-ki-Yor, the laver בֵּֽין־ <S%H996><s%> bein- between אֹ֥הֶל <S%H168><s%> 'O-hel between the tent מוֹעֵ֖ד <S%H4150><s%> mo-'Ed of the congregation וּבֵ֣ין <S%H996><s%> u-Vein between הַמִּזְבֵּ֑חַ <S%H4196><s%> ham-miz-Be-ach; and the altar וְנָתַתָּ֥ <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-ta-Ta and shalt put שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> sham in it מָֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim. water

וְשַׂמְתָּ֥ <S%H7760><s%> ve-sam-Ta And thou shalt set up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הֶחָצֵ֖ר <S%H2691><s%> he-cha-Tzer the court סָבִ֑יב <S%H5439><s%> sa-Viv; round about וְנָ֣תַתָּ֔ <S%H5414><s%> ve-Na-ta-ta, and hang up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מָסַ֖ךְ <S%H4539><s%> ma-Sach the hanging שַׁ֥עַר <S%H8179><s%> Sha-'ar gate הֶחָצֵֽר׃ <S%H2691><s%> he-cha-Tzer. at the court

וְלָקַחְתָּ֙ <S%H3947><s%> ve-la-kach-Ta And thou shalt take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שֶׁ֣מֶן <S%H8081><s%> She-men oil הַמִּשְׁחָ֔ה <S%H4888><s%> ham-mish-Chah, the anointing וּמָשַׁחְתָּ֥ <S%H4886><s%> u-ma-shach-Ta and anoint אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַמִּשְׁכָּ֖ן <S%H4908><s%> ham-mish-Kan the tabernacle וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- and all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- after בּ֑וֹ bo; וְקִדַּשְׁתָּ֥ <S%H6942><s%> ve-kid-dash-Ta and all that [is] therein and shalt hallow אֹת֛וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- and all כֵּלָ֖יו <S%H3627><s%> ke-Lav it and all the vessels וְהָ֥יָה <S%H1961><s%> ve-Ha-yah become קֹֽדֶשׁ׃ <S%H6944><s%> Ko-desh. thereof and it shall be holy

וּמָשַׁחְתָּ֛ <S%H4886><s%> u-ma-shach-Ta And thou shalt anoint אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מִזְבַּ֥ח <S%H4196><s%> miz-Bach the altar הָעֹלָ֖ה <S%H5930><s%> ha-'o-Lah of the burnt offering וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- and all כֵּלָ֑יו <S%H3627><s%> ke-Lav; and all his vessels וְקִדַּשְׁתָּ֙ <S%H6942><s%> ve-kid-dash-Ta and sanctify אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חַ <S%H4196><s%> ham-miz-Be-ach, the altar וְהָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah become הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <S%H4196><s%> ham-miz-Be-ach and it shall be an altar קֹ֥דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> Ko-desh most קָֽדָשִֽׁים׃ <S%H6944><s%> Ka-da-Shim. holy

וּמָשַׁחְתָּ֥ <S%H4886><s%> u-ma-shach-Ta And thou shalt anoint אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַכִּיֹּ֖ר <S%H3595><s%> hak-ki-Yor the laver וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et כַּנּ֑וֹ <S%H3653><s%> kan-No; and his foot וְקִדַּשְׁתָּ֖ <S%H6942><s%> ve-kid-dash-Ta and sanctify אֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H853><s%> o-To.

וְהִקְרַבְתָּ֤ <S%H7126><s%> ve-hik-rav-Ta And thou shalt bring אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אַהֲרֹן֙ <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron Aaron וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et בָּנָ֔יו <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nav, and his sons אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to פֶּ֖תַח <S%H6607><s%> Pe-tach unto the door אֹ֣הֶל <S%H168><s%> 'O-hel of the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֑ד <S%H4150><s%> mo-'Ed; of the congregation וְרָחַצְתָּ֥ <S%H7364><s%> ve-ra-chatz-Ta and wash אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam בַּמָּֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> bam-Ma-yim. them with water

וְהִלְבַּשְׁתָּ֙ <S%H3847><s%> ve-hil-bash-Ta And thou shalt put אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אַהֲרֹ֔ן <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron, upon Aaron אֵ֖ת <S%H854><s%> 'et for בִּגְדֵ֣י <S%H899><s%> big-Dei garments הַקֹּ֑דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> hak-Ko-desh; the holy וּמָשַׁחְתָּ֥ <S%H4886><s%> u-ma-shach-Ta and anoint אֹת֛וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To וְקִדַּשְׁתָּ֥ <S%H6942><s%> ve-kid-dash-Ta him and sanctify אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To וְכִהֵ֥ן <S%H3547><s%> ve-chi-Hen him that he may minister unto me in the priest's office לִֽי׃ Li.

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et בָּנָ֖יו <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nav his sons תַּקְרִ֑יב <S%H7126><s%> tak-Riv; And thou shalt bring וְהִלְבַּשְׁתָּ֥ <S%H3847><s%> ve-hil-bash-Ta and clothe אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam כֻּתֳּנֹֽת׃ <S%H3801><s%> kut-to-Not. them with coats

וּמָשַׁחְתָּ֣ <S%H4886><s%> u-ma-shach-Ta And thou shalt anoint אֹתָ֗ם <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam, כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher you מָשַׁ֙חְתָּ֙ <S%H4886><s%> ma-Shach-ta them as thou didst anoint אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֲבִיהֶ֔ם <S%H1><s%> 'a-vi-Hem, their father וְכִהֲנ֖וּ <S%H3547><s%> ve-chi-ha-Nu that they may minister unto me in the priest's office לִ֑י Li; וְ֠הָיְתָה <S%H1961><s%> Ve-ha-ye-tah will qualify לִהְיֹ֨ת <S%H1961><s%> lih-Yot will qualify לָהֶ֧ם la-Hem מָשְׁחָתָ֛ם <S%H4888><s%> ma-she-cha-Tam for their anointing לִכְהֻנַּ֥ת <S%H3550><s%> lich-hun-Nat priesthood עוֹלָ֖ם <S%H5769><s%> o-Lam shall surely be an everlasting לְדֹרֹתָֽם׃ <S%H1755><s%> le-do-ro-Tam throughout their generations

וַיַּ֖עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> vai-Ya-'as Thus did מֹשֶׁ֑ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh; Moses כְּ֠כֹל <S%H3605><s%> Ke-chol to all אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after צִוָּ֧ה <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Vah commanded יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh according to all that the LORD אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To כֵּ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> ken so עָשָֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah. him so did ס sa-Mek

וַיְהִ֞י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi become בַּחֹ֧דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> ba-Cho-desh month הָרִאשׁ֛וֹן <S%H7223><s%> ha-ri-Shon And it came to pass in the first בַּשָּׁנָ֥ה <S%H8141><s%> bash-sha-Nah year הַשֵּׁנִ֖ית <S%H8145><s%> hash-she-Nit in the second בְּאֶחָ֣ד <S%H259><s%> be-'e-Chad on the first לַחֹ֑דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> la-Cho-desh; [day] of the month הוּקַ֖ם <S%H6965><s%> hu-Kam was reared up הַמִּשְׁכָּֽן׃ <S%H4908><s%> ham-mish-Kan. [that] the tabernacle

וַיִּפְרֹ֤שׂ <S%H6566><s%> vai-yif-Ros And he spread abroad אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאֹ֙הֶל֙ <S%H168><s%> ha-'O-hel the tent עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over הַמִּשְׁכָּ֔ן <S%H4908><s%> ham-mish-Kan, over the tabernacle וַיָּ֜שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> vai-Ya-sem and put אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מִכְסֵ֥ה <S%H4372><s%> mich-Seh the covering הָאֹ֛הֶל <S%H168><s%> ha-'O-hel of the tent עָלָ֖יו <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav over מִלְמָ֑עְלָה <S%H4605><s%> mil-Ma-'e-lah; above כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher after צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Vah commanded יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh upon it as the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh. Moses ס sa-Mek

וַיִּקַּ֞ח <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-Kach And he took וַיִּתֵּ֤ן <S%H5414><s%> vai-yit-Ten and put אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָעֵדֻת֙ <S%H5715><s%> ha-'e-Dut the testimony אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הָ֣אָרֹ֔ן <S%H727><s%> ha-'a-Ron, into the ark וַיָּ֥שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> vai-Ya-sem and set אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַבַּדִּ֖ים <S%H905><s%> hab-bad-Dim the staves עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- unto הָאָרֹ֑ן <S%H727><s%> ha-'a-Ron; on the ark וַיִּתֵּ֧ן <S%H5414><s%> vai-yit-Ten and put אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַכַּפֹּ֛רֶת <S%H3727><s%> hak-kap-Po-ret the mercy seat עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- of הָאָרֹ֖ן <S%H727><s%> ha-'a-Ron upon the ark מִלְמָֽעְלָה׃ <S%H4605><s%> mil-Ma-'e-lah. above

וַיָּבֵ֣א <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Ve And he brought אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאָרֹן֮ <S%H727><s%> ha-'a-Ron the ark אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- into הַמִּשְׁכָּן֒ <S%H4908><s%> ham-mish-Kan into the tabernacle וַיָּ֗שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> vai-Ya-sem, and set up אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> 'et פָּרֹ֣כֶת <S%H6532><s%> pa-Ro-chet the vail הַמָּסָ֔ךְ <S%H4539><s%> ham-ma-Sach, of the covering וַיָּ֕סֶךְ <S%H5526><s%> vai-Ya-sech and covered עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al and אֲר֣וֹן <S%H727><s%> a-Ron the ark הָעֵד֑וּת <S%H5715><s%> ha-'e-Dut; of the testimony כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher after צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Vah commanded יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh as the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh. וַיִּתֵּ֤ן <S%H5414><s%> vai-yit-Ten And he put אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַשֻּׁלְחָן֙ <S%H7979><s%> hash-shul-Chan the table בְּאֹ֣הֶל <S%H168><s%> be-'O-hel in the tent מוֹעֵ֔ד <S%H4150><s%> mo-'Ed, of the congregation עַ֛ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al and יֶ֥רֶךְ <S%H3409><s%> Ye-rech upon the side הַמִּשְׁכָּ֖ן <S%H4908><s%> ham-mish-Kan of the tabernacle צָפֹ֑נָה <S%H6828><s%> tza-Fo-nah; northward מִח֖וּץ <S%H2351><s%> mi-Chutz without לַפָּרֹֽכֶת׃ <S%H6532><s%> lap-pa-Ro-chet. the vail
